callout: A RIVETING DISPLAY OF REPRESENTATIVE DEMOCRACY.
middlesex:
If there's one thing Magic's greatest and most expedient format needs, it's more politics. That's why this deck brings the world's only erosion-based political universe to life in living cardboard.

Based on the hit stage play Sand and it's subsequent movie adaptation, true fans will get to live out their most sedimentary fantasies.
doublesex:
All this diplomacy can be tough to swallow so, when you've had enough, why not wash it down with a tall glass of a voter demogaphic.

You'd have to be an Idiot to miss out on that value.
commandersex:
Speaking of consumption, the SCU's most beloved character has finished his course of antibiotics and is ready for a new coat of paint.

The only planeswalker to ever get his spark out of sheer boredom, Dave (pronounced DAHV) is ready to help you gerrysander your way to victory.

decksplay.ben: Have You Ever Ben In Love?

deckliners.ben: Have You Ever Ben In Love?
